data.title: Westview High
data.text:
More than Hashtags - The OPSProud Podcast: July 2024

"How does new curriculum improve the student experience?" Hear from Central High teacher Molly Mattison about how new materials engage students and offer more choice in her English classroom and beyond.

Inside Omaha Public Schools: July 2024

Students get a jump start on college through dual enrollment courses, and a district-wide focus on behavior support strategies brings meaningful results to our schools. Learn more in this month's edition.

Omaha Public Schools Students Get Head Start on College Credits

From world history to human geography to calculus, students earned more than 22,000 college credit hours in the 2023-24 school year thanks to dual enrollment programs. See how our partnerships help students challenge themselves and save time and money as they work toward a degree.

Creating a Supportive Environment Within the Omaha Public Schools

Collaborative efforts among staff, families and students make a positive impact on student behavior. “It sets the foundation and creates an environment for every single student in that school.”

Mariachi Summer Band Camp Celebrates Collaboration and Cultural Heritage

See highlights from the week as student musicians from across our district learned four songs before performing for friends and family.
